name: Desert Miner II
description:
It's been a while.
But now you're back and this time with a plan.
You're going to mine the desert for all it's treasures.

An odd follow up on the game we did the year before.
Now you have to setup your mining operation in the desert and try to strike it rich, without getting blown away by the tornados.

Controls

Left click - walk
Right click - build / upgrade (when in range of a mining spot)
Spacebar or scrollwheel click - map / legend
Scrollwheel - zoom

A mining spot is a crack in the desert floor, get close and right click to build a mining station (or upgrade one that is already there).

Credits

Once again made in a weekend by my brother and me in 2014 using CraftStudio.
